div.p:
I'm a Human Resources coordinator so it's critical that the files I handle are the most up-to-date versions.

GCDOCS ensures we are accessing the right information which helps us all stay on the same page.

I love the fact that GCDOCS lets me send my boss or my colleagues

a link to my documents or emails so they always have access to the most recent version.

With the links, any time a file is revised or updated everyone on the team has the newest version automatically

whether it’s a meeting agenda, a presentation deck, or the latest benefits spreadsheet.
